 2017-16952017-12-15PS,  ,  ,  , 
ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectProvincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 211, British Columbia
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 211 which makes a declaration of federal concern and authorizes the provision of financial assistance to the province of BRITISH COLUMBIA, with respect to the exceptional wildfires that occurred on the 2017 summer season.
